verses.verse: וַיִּמְעֲל֧וּ <WH4603> vai-yim-'a-Lu committed בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- But the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מַ֖עַל <WH4604> Ma-'al a trespass בַּחֵ֑רֶם <WH2764> ba-Che-rem; in the accursed thing וַיִּקַּ֡ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took עָכָ֣ן <WH5912> 'a-Chan for Achan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son כַּרְמִי֩ <WH3756> kar-Mi of Carmi בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son זַבְדִּ֨י <WH2067> zav-Di of Zabdi בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son זֶ֜רַח <WH2226> Ze-rach of Zerah לְמַטֵּ֤ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh of the tribe יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah מִן־ <WH4480> min- some הַחֵ֔רֶם <WH2764> ha-Che-rem, of the accursed thing וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> vai-yi-char- was kindled אַ֥ף <WH639> 'af and the anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בִּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> biv-Nei against the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

Ai

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu So there went up מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am thither of the people שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> Sham-mah, there כִּשְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> kish-Lo-shet about three אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish; men וַיָּנֻ֕סוּ <WH5127> vai-ya-Nu-su and they fled לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> 'an-Shei the men הָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> ha-'Ai. of Ai

וַיִּקְרַ֨ע <WH7167> vai-yik-Ra' rent יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua שִׂמְלֹתָ֗יו <WH8071> sim-lo-Tav, his clothes וַיִּפֹּל֩ <WH5307> vai-yip-Pol and fell עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פָּנָ֨יו <WH6440> pa-Nav upon his face אַ֜רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah to the earth לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until הָעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> ha-'E-rev, until the eventide ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he וְזִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> ve-zik-Nei he and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu and put עָפָ֖ר <WH6083> 'a-Far dust עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹאשָֽׁם׃ <WH7218> ro-Sham. upon their heads

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua אֲהָ֣הּ׀ <WH162> 'a-Hah Alas O אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD לָ֠מָה <WH4100> La-mah why הֵעֲבַ֨רְתָּ <WH5674> he-'a-Var-ta wherefore hast thou at all הַעֲבִ֜יר <WH5674> ha-'a-Vir over אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> ha-'Am this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz-Zeh this אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> hai-yar-Den, Jordan לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> la-Tet to deliver אֹתָ֛נוּ <WH853> 'o-Ta-nu בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> be-Yad us into the hand הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites לְהַאֲבִידֵ֑נוּ <WH6> le-ha-'a-vi-De-nu; to destroy וְלוּ֙ <WH3863> ve-Lu us;would to God הוֹאַ֣לְנוּ <WH2974> ho-'Al-nu we had been content וַנֵּ֔שֶׁב <WH3427> van-Ne-shev, and dwelt בְּעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> be-'E-ver on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> hai-yar-Den. Jordan

בִּ֖י <WH994> bi O אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; Lord מָ֣ה <WH4100> mah what אֹמַ֔ר <WH559> 'o-Mar, what shall I say אַ֠חֲרֵי <WH310> 'A-cha-rei when אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after הָפַ֧ךְ <WH2015> ha-Fach turneth יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El Israel עֹ֖רֶף <WH6203> 'O-ref their backs לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vav. their enemies

וְיִשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> ve-yish-me-'U shall hear הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, For the Canaanites וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> ve-Chol and all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei and all the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, of the land וְנָסַ֣בּוּ <WH5437> ve-na-Sab-bu [of it] and shall environ us round עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu, and וְהִכְרִ֥יתוּ <WH3772> ve-hich-Ri-tu and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁמֵ֖נוּ <WH8034> she-Me-nu our name מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; from the earth וּמַֽה־ <WH4100> u-mah- and what תַּעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh and what wilt thou do לְשִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> le-shim-Cha our name הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol. unto thy great ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' unto Joshua קֻ֣ם <WH6965> kum Get thee up לָ֑ךְ Lach; לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Why זֶּ֔ה <WH2088> Zeh, he אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you נֹפֵ֥ל <WH5307> no-Fel wherefore liest עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha. accept

חָטָא֙ <WH2398> cha-Ta hath sinned יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Israel וְגַם֙ <WH1571> ve-Gam have also עָבְר֣וּ <WH5674> 'a-ve-Ru and they have also transgressed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֔י <WH1285> be-ri-Ti, my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which צִוִּ֖יתִי <WH6680> tziv-Vi-ti which I commanded אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> o-Tam; וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> ve-Gam have even לָֽקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> la-ke-Chu them for they have even taken מִן־ <WH4480> min- some הַחֵ֔רֶם <WH2764> ha-Che-rem, of the accursed thing וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> ve-Gam both גָּֽנְבוּ֙ <WH1589> ga-ne-Vu and have also stolen וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> ve-Gam have also כִּֽחֲשׁ֔וּ <WH3584> ki-cha-Shu, and dissembled וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> ve-Gam have even שָׂ֥מוּ <WH7760> Sa-mu also and they have put בִכְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3627> vich-lei-Hem. [it] even among their own stuff

וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> ve-Lo except יֻכְל֜וּ <WH3201> yuch-Lu could בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei Therefore the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לָקוּם֙ <WH6965> la-Kum not stand לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֹיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Hem, their enemies עֹ֗רֶף <WH6203> 'O-ref, [their] backs יִפְנוּ֙ <WH6437> yif-Nu [but] turned לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH341> 'o-ye-vei-Hem, their enemies כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for הָי֖וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu have become לְחֵ֑רֶם <WH2764> le-Che-rem; because they were accursed לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo not אוֹסִיף֙ <WH3254> o-Sif neither will I be with you any more לִֽהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> lih-Yot have become עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> 'im-ma-Chem, with אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not תַשְׁמִ֛ידוּ <WH8045> tash-Mi-du ye destroy הַחֵ֖רֶם <WH2764> ha-Che-rem the accursed מִֽקִּרְבְּכֶֽם׃ <WH7130> Mik-kir-be-Chem. from among

קֻ֚ם <WH6965> kum Up קַדֵּ֣שׁ <WH6942> kad-Desh sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, the people וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say הִתְקַדְּשׁ֣וּ <WH6942> hit-kad-de-Shu Sanctify לְמָחָ֑ר <WH4279> le-ma-Char; yourselves against to morrow כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for כֹה֩ <WH3541> choh thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> 'a-Mar for thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel חֵ֤רֶם <WH2764> Che-rem [There is] an accursed thing בְּקִרְבְּךָ֙ <WH7130> be-kir-be-Cha in the midst יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of thee O Israel לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not תוּכַ֗ל <WH3201> tu-Chal, thou canst לָקוּם֙ <WH6965> la-Kum not stand לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֹיְבֶ֔יךָ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha, thine enemies עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until הֲסִירְכֶ֥ם <WH5493> ha-sir-Chem until ye take away הַחֵ֖רֶם <WH2764> ha-Che-rem the accursed thing מִֽקִּרְבְּכֶֽם׃ <WH7130> Mik-kir-be-Chem. from among
